original_text: But you must not eat the blood of any animal. You must pour it on the ground like water.
korean_text: 오직 그 피는 먹지 말고 물 같이 땅에 쏟을 것이며

sentences.original_text: But you must not eat the blood
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신은 피를 먹어서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: You must pour it on the ground
